name: Dirk Danger And The Temple Of The Feathered Serpent
name_original: Dirk Danger And The Temple Of The Feathered Serpent
description:
You play as titular explorer and adventurer Dirk Danger as he attempts to save his business by beating Dare Devil, an evil corporation run by Dirks longtime rival Darius Devilish, to the fabled Feathers of Quetzalcoatl.

This short game was made just by myself as a collection of assessments over several months for a first year Game Design course. Date finished 21/08/19

All scripting, art, and writing done by me excluding textures which were pulled from the internet.

It has a few quirks.
- Alt-F4 to exit game
- If mouse is on screen when game starts it will remain there
